title: League stops responding
body: Been playing same system for about a year. Today it says that display driver stopped responding and i cant play league without it saying that it has stopped responding and closing it. It also happens when i play hearthstone. how can i fix th is?

replies.body:
If you're seeing this with multiple games/applications, I'd say that the first step is double checking your drivers to make sure they're up to date.

Not sure what video card you're using, but you can find Nvidia's driver download page [here](http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx?lang=en-us) and AMD's driver download page [here](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download)
Thanks, installing those atm. Just a bit confused why everything went bad today. Headset broke, PC is being very slow and everythings not responding so ya...
